title: S17 Ep73: Vampires, Gators, & Wackos: Tales of Florida Man w/Frank Stanfield
itunes:title: Vampires, Gators, & Wackos: Tales of Florida Man w/Frank Stanfield
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents Vampires, Gators, and Wackos: Tales of Florida Man with Journalist/Author Frank Stanfield

During his decades long crime coverage in Central Florida, journalist Frank Stanfield covered every atrocity that man or nature could unleash!  Vampires, Gators, and Wackos covers some of the frequently craven and downright stupid crimes that Stanfield has covered in the field during his tenure! Frank joins True Crime Tuesday today to give us some examples of those crimes. talk about the state of newspaper reporting today, and what makes Florida Man so different than other criminals around the country!

PLUS: An all new Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals with Beer City Bruiser!!

Get "Vampires, Gators, and Wackos" here:    https://bit.ly/3QwyEA2

Check out where you can see Beer City Bruiser near you!  https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
